Package org.firebirdsql.ds

Class Summary
AbstractPooledConnection PooledConnection implementation for FBConnectionPoolDataSource This class is abstract to account for both a JDBC 3.0 and JDBC 4.0 compliant implementation.
DataSourceFactory ObjectFactory for the DataSources in org.firebirdsql.ds.
FBAbstractCommonDataSource Abstract class for properties and behaviour common to DataSources, XADataSources and ConnectionPoolDataSources
FBConnectionPoolDataSource Bare-bones implementation of ConnectionPoolDataSource.
FBPooledConnection JDBC 4.0 implementation of PooledConnection.
FBXAConnection XAConnection implementation for FBXADataSource
FBXADataSource Bare-bones implementation of XADataSource.
ReflectionHelper Class containing static helper methods for reflective access.
RootCommonDataSource Root superclass for the datasources in Firebird.
XAConnectionHandler InvocationHandler for the logical connection returned by FBXAConnection.
